home.presentation: 20 Billions of Pounds of food are wasted every year in France. Fight Food Waste is a non-profit organization aiming to reduce this alarming number. We ensure that nearly expired products are donated to private individuals or other organizations. Everyone can donate products for free: you just need to enter your contact details and submit your products to our application and we will fetch them for you at your home. Help us fight food waste!
